Hangman¶

Python Hangman¶

A well tested, cli, python version-agnostic, multi-platform hangman game. It’s built following TDD principles and each component services a sensibly distinct logical purpose.

This module is called to choose a random word for the game.

class hangman.dictionary.Dictionary[source]¶

Callable class that returns a random word from a static dictionary.

__call__()[source]¶

Pick a word at random.

Returns:A random word.
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

This module contains all of the game logic.

This module handles user interaction. Printing and prompting.

This module is responsible for guiding the user throught the game.
